annotations.description: It was an attractive offensive game and the fans have no reason to be upset. Real Madrid had more of the game and were superior. Their manager will certainly be the happier of the two managers. Both teams attempted to play possession football.

Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) unleashed a promising strike from a long distance free kick, but his effort goes high over the bar so it's going to be a goal kick.

annotations.description: Jesus Gil Manzano shows a yellow card to Petros (Betis), who isn't surprised as the tackle was really hard and late.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: We will have 2 min. of added time.
Ruben Castro (Betis) attempts to score as he rises near the penalty spot and heads the ball to the middle of the goal. Keylor Navas pulls off a comfortable save to stop the ball from hitting the net.
What a chance that is! Ruben Castro (Betis) finds himself unmarked in a promising position after receiving a cross on the edge of the box and his attempt sails a whisker wide of the left post.

Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) connects with a pass inside the box, but his effort goes well wide of the left post.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: It's in the back of the net! Alvaro Morata slips the ball through to Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid), and he darts into the box to unleash a magnificent shot into the bottom left corner. He makes it 1:6.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: The foul by Roman Zozulya (Betis) is worthy of a card and a yellow is duly shown by Jesus Gil Manzano.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) decides to have a shot at goal from the free kick, but it hits the defensive wall.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Here's the change. Karim Benzema leaves the pitch and Alvaro Morata (Real Madrid) comes on as a substitute.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Isco (Real Madrid) receives the ball inside the box, reacts quickly and without any problems stabs the ball into the top right corner.
An attempted cross from Joaquin (Betis) is cleared.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Joaquin displays great vision and sends a pass to Alvaro Cejudo (Betis), who shows brilliant composure inside the box to bury the ball into the bottom left corner. The score is 1:4.
Riza Durmisi (Betis) swings a cross into the box, but it's far too close to Keylor Navas, who smothers the ball.
Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) tries to send a pass but it's blocked.

Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) finds himself some space to meet a beautiful cross from the free kick, and from near the penalty spot he attempts to score with a header. His effort lacks accuracy and floats high over the bar.
Joaquin (Betis) connects with a cross from the side and steers a header from around the penalty spot towards the goal. The ball goes in the right direction, but it's stopped by one of the defenders.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Jesus Gil Manzano shows a yellow card to German Pezzella (Betis) for a tough tackle.
Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) makes room to connect with a cross, but his strike from the penalty spot isn't accurate at all and the ball goes well over the bar.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The need to improve in the second half has brought about a change. Alex Alegria comes off for Alvaro Cejudo (Betis).

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Half time substitution. Darko Brasanac is replaced by Roman Zozulya (Betis).

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The players are back out on the pitch following the half time break and the second half is about to start.

Up to now it has been an action packed game full of wonderful movements and opportunities. Great display from Real Madrid so far, looking at stats you have to say that they were the better side during that opening 45 minutes. The home team tries to find the weakness in the opposition's defence, especially with rapid counter attacks, while the away team play possession football.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee blows his whistle to end the first half and the players are now heading to their respective dressing rooms.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Pepe puts the ball on a plate for Isco (Real Madrid), who scores with a simple close range finish. It's 0:4.

Ruben Castro (Betis) collects a brilliant pass inside the box and finds himself in a goal scoring opportunity. He takes a shot, but the effort is well blocked by one of the defending players.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Isco (Real Madrid) was quite harsh and Jesus Gil Manzano didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The resulting corner from Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) is cleared by the defence.

Daniel Carvajal (Real Madrid) sends a lofted cross into the penalty area. Unfortunately for him, the opponent's defence deals with his cross comfortably and intercepts it. Real Madrid have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Marcelo (Real Madrid) fires the rebound inside the right post after the ball breaks to him in the box. The score is 0:3.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Toni Kroos feeds the ball through to Karim Benzema (Real Madrid), who picks up the pass inside the box and quickly sends it into the bottom left corner! The goalkeeper was helpless. 0:1!
Ruben Castro (Betis) unleashes a shot, but his effort is poor and floats well wide of the right post.

Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) unleashes a shot from the edge of the box, but it goes straight at Antonio Adan.

Marcelo (Real Madrid) found some space to play in a lofted pass, but he looks disappointed as none of his teammates managed to connect with it.
Ruben Castro (Betis) takes a mid range shot, but the ball sails high over the bar.
Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) reacts well near the penalty spot to connect with the resulting corner, but fails to direct his header into the back of the net. The ball floats high over the bar.

Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) misses an absolute sitter after connecting with a cross inside the penalty box.
